skill.name: Blade Vigor
skill.desc: Heal and deal physical damage to the current target. Healing and damage are increased by up to 100% based on Aatrox's missing health.

skill.name: Pure Heart Breaker
skill.desc:
Deal magic damage to the current target, increased up to 50% based on the target's missing health.

If the target dies, deal 55% of overkill damage split between the 2 closest enemies, plus magic damage per target.

skill.name: Piercing Phantom Strike
skill.desc:
Mark the farthest unmarked target within 4 hexes, then dash through all marked enemies in order. Each dash deals magic damage to its target and magic damage to other enemies hit.

If only one enemy remains, dash 3 times instead

skill.name: Gates of Avarosa
skill.desc: The next 8 attacks fire bonus arrows dealing total physical damage split between the target and up to two random enemies within 2 hexes.

skill.name: El Tigre Tornado
skill.desc:
Stun the target and spin them around for 1.5 seconds, dealing physical damage to the target and to other enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Then throw the target forward, dealing in a 1-hex area around the target. If the target drops below 18% health, throw them off the board instead.

skill.name: Magic Bouncing Bullet
skill.desc:
Fire a bullet at the farthest enemy, dealing physical damage to the first target hit. The bullet bounces to a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage.

Potential : Bullets bounce times.

skill.name: Grand Guillotine
skill.desc: Heal health, then deal physical damage to the current target, increased by 60% against Tanks. If the target dies, immediately recast dealing 75% damage.

skill.name: Steel Chair Slam
skill.desc:
Passive: Every 7 seconds the next attack deals bonus physical damage.

Active: Gain maximum health over 1.5 seconds and immediately trigger the passive.

skill.name: The World Stands Still
skill.desc:
Ekko was pulled from another universe by the Isekai augment.

Freeze all units while attacking the nearest 4 enemies 7 total times. Each attack deals bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Rising Spell Force
skill.desc:
Fire a blast at the current target, dealing magic damage and physical damage.

Potential : Blink a short distance, then gain 25% Attack Speed for 5 seconds and Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat.

skill.name: Piston Punch
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 3 seconds and deal magic damage to the target.

skill.name: Sword Protocol: Powerful Strike
skill.desc: Gain a shield for 4 seconds and deal magic damage to all enemies within a 2-hex cone. The primary target takes additional magic damage.

skill.name: Sword Protocol: Ultimate Strike
skill.desc:
Gain a shield for 3 seconds and deal magic damage to enemies in a 3-hex cone.

Every 3 cast, unleash a powerful strike that deals magic damage in a 4-hex line and stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Golden Giga Gun
skill.desc: Deal physical damage to the lowest health enemy within (Range) 2 hexes. If the target dies, 40% chance to gain 1 gold.

skill.name: Mighty Blade of Justice
skill.desc:
Heal and deal physical damage to the target.

Potential : Gain 1 stack on cast. Each stack grants max Health.

skill.name: Gadagadagada!
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 8 (AP) Attack Speed for each attack against the same target, up to 8 (AP).

Active: For 6 seconds, gain 90% Attack Damage and grant two nearby allies Attack Damage, prioritizing Attack champions.

skill.name: Soul Stitch / Rip The Threads
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal magic damage to the target, and magic damage split among all enemies in the cone. Every 3rd cast is Rip the Threads

Soul Stitch: Fire 3 needles through the board, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and leaving threads behind.

Rip The Threads: Deal split between all enemies and bonus magic damage to each. Enemies near at least one thread take 10% more damage.

skill.name: Crystal Chrysalis
skill.desc: Grant shield to the 2 lowest Health allies for 4 seconds and fire 4 butterflies dealing magic damage split between the 2 closest enemies.

skill.name: Mega Drill Crash
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 4 seconds, then slam into a group of enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies within a 2 hex radius and Stunning them.

skill.name: Thundering Hammerstrike
skill.desc:
Deal physical damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

Potential : Shoot sparks split between the 3 nearest enemies. Sparks deal physical damage and reduce armor by 3.

skill.name: The Curtain Falls
skill.desc: Passive: Attack Speed is always 0.75. Convert 1% bonus Attack Speed into 0.8% Attack Damage. Every fourth attack is enhanced to deal physical damage.

skill.name: Star Rocket Blast Off!
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks grant stacking Attack Speed, up to 60%. Critical strikes instead grant 9% .

Active: Deal physical damage to the target and physical damage split across a 2-hex radius centered on the target.

skill.name: Missile Massacre
skill.desc:
Passive: Kills grant 1% permanent Attack Damage.

Active: Fire 8 missiles divided between the target and nearby enemies. Each missile deals physical damage.

skill.name: Spirit Spear
skill.desc: Hurl a spear at the farthest enemy, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit. If the enemy dies the spear continues, dealing overkill damage to the next enemy hit.

skill.name: Destruction Disc
skill.desc: Fire an energy disc that deals total magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

skill.name: Teleports Behind You
skill.desc:
Blink to the enemy with the lowest health within 2 hexes and deal magic damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius.

Potential : Blink again, dealing magic damage.

skill.name: Unleash the Demon
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal bonus magic damage. Gain additional power based on your Tactician level.

Level 6: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals magic damage and 20% shreds enemies for 3 seconds.
Level 9: Every attack launches a wave. Waves travel farther.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

skill.name: Eye of the Hurricane
skill.desc: Heal Health. then deal magic damage to the 2 nearest enemies and Stun them for 1 seconds.

skill.name: Golden Paw Mantra
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 3 seconds. The next attack deals bonus physical damage and Stuns for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Static Surge
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 1 AP per Monster Trainer level. Attacks deal bonus magic damage.

Active: The next attack deals bonus magic damage to the target and the 2 closest enemies, then 30% Shred and Sunder them for 4 seconds.

Level 15: On-cast, gain 15% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Level 30: Gain infinite range and increase Attack Speed bonuses by 15%. Max Attack Speed is now 6.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor

skill.name: Breakout Force
skill.desc:
Passive (ALL OUT): On first death instead heal to full, gain 125% Attack Speed, convert 50% of Armor and Magic Resist into Attack Damage, and set max mana to 30. Then dash through the target and briefly Stun them. While ALL OUT, lose 6% Health each second and heal 300 Health on kill.

Active: Gain Durability for 3 seconds, then deal physical damage to the target.

Active (ALL OUT): . Deal physical damage to the target.

skill.name: A Demonstration of Skill
skill.desc:
Field Lee Sin to choose a stance. Each stance has a unique ability, and grants Lee Sin a bonus trait. Choose from Executioner, Duelist, or Juggernaut.

Juggernaut Stance: Big Bang Punch
Briefly gain 60% Durability, then deal physical damage to the target, physical damage to all enemies behind the target, and physical damage to other enemies in a 2-hex radius.
---
Duelist Stance: 10,000 Fist Flurry
Passive: On attack, deal physical damage to a nearby enemy.
Active: Strike swiftly, sending afterimages to the nearest 15 enemies. Each deals physical damage and reduces armor.
---
Executioner Stance: Crashing Meteor Kicks
Deal physical damage to the lowest Health enemy within 3 hexes and stun them for 1.5 seconds. Other enemies in a 1-hex radius take physical damage.
After 3 kills with this ability all enemies instantly take physical damage and are knocked up for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Aegis of Unbreakable Dawn
skill.desc:
Shield for 4 seconds and deal magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Potential: Fire sunbursts through enemies within 3-hexes. Each steals Armor and Magic Resist and deals magic damage.

skill.name: Twin Cannon Fire
skill.desc: Fire 4 shots towards the target. Each deals magic damage to the first enemy hit. For each miss, restore 8 mana.

skill.name: Choose A Monster
skill.desc: Field Lulu to choose a monster to train! Each monster has unique abilities.

skill.name: Soulfire Explosion
skill.desc: Fire an energy ball towards the largest group of enemies containing the target. On arrival, 20% shred enemies in a 1-hex radius for 5 seconds and deal magic damage split between them plus magic damage to each.

skill.name: Regolith Resistance
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 25% more Armor.

Active: Deal physical damage to enemies in a cone.

skill.name: Insidious Whispers
skill.desc:
Infect the closest 1 uninfected targets, dealing 520/780/1300 (AP) magic damage over 15 seconds. If an infected target dies, the infection spreads to the nearest uninfected target for any remaining time.

If all enemies are infected, this effect can stack.

skill.name: Spinning Soul-Saw
skill.desc: Gain shield for 2 seconds, then deal physical damage to the target.

skill.name: Falling Flower Eruption
skill.desc: Gain 35% Durability and heal over 2 seconds, then deal magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

skill.name: Spinning Galaxy Hammer
skill.desc: Gain Shield for 4 seconds. When it breaks, deal physical damage to the target and physical damage to other enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. The target is Stunned for 0.5-2.5 seconds based on how long the shield held, and other enemies are briefly Stunned.

skill.name: All Eyes On Me
skill.desc:
Heal health and deal magic damage to the 3 closest enemies.

Potential : Heal the 2 lowest percent Health allies for health.

skill.name: Durian Defense
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 1 Armor & MR per Monster Trainer level

Active: Gain Shield for 4 seconds. When it breaks, deal magic damage to the nearest 3 enemies and Stun them for 1 second.

Level 15: On cast, leap to the largest group within 2 hexes and Taunt enemies. Gain max Health per enemy Taunted.

Level 30: Gain an additional 1 Armor and MR Magic Resist per Trainer level. Increase the Stun to 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Unbreakable Celestial Lance
skill.desc: Deal magic damage in a short line through the target, then reduce damage taken for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Tsunami Beam
skill.desc: Deal magic damage to the target over 3 seconds. Enemies in a 1-hex radius around the target take over the same duration.

skill.name: Soul Shot / Inner Arsenal Unleashed
skill.desc:
Passive: After casting, gain 1 Style and 5% Omnivamp, up of 4 stacks. At max stacks, the next cast is Inner Arsenal Unleashed.

Soul Shot: Deal physical damage to the target and dash a short distance.

Inner Arsenal Unleashed: Double the passive bonus and leap to a nearby group of enemies, dealing to all enemies in a 2-hex radius. Reset your Style to 0.

skill.name: Super Beam Cannon
skill.desc:
Over 1 second, deal physical damage in a line through the current target. Enemies after the first take instead.

When no targets are left, regain mana based on the time remaining.

skill.name: Ultimate Friendship Bomb
skill.desc:
Passive: Ultimate Friendship Bomb's damage scales on Power of Friendship, which is based on all of your team's bonus stats (AD & AP & Armor & MR & AS & Crit & CritMult & Health). Stats on Seraphine contribute more.

Active: Fire a friendship bomb towards the largest group of enemies within 4 hexes, dealing magic damage in a 2-hex radius.

skill.name: Maximum Grit Overdrive
skill.desc:
Over a short duration, heal and deal physical damage to the target.

Then, deal physical damage in a cone. Enemies in the center line take more physical damage, increased based on healing received this combat.

skill.name: Power Suit: Full Charge
skill.desc: Shield for 4 seconds. The next 3 attacks deal bonus true damage.

skill.name: Star Cutter
skill.desc: Launch a returning blade 2-hexes through the current target. It deals physical damage to enemies hit, reduced by 40% per hit.

skill.name: Burn Blast
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 1% AD per Monster Trainer level. Damage Burns and Wounds for 5 seconds.

Active: Deal 400/600/960 (AD) physical damage to the target, and 50/75/120 (AP) magic damage to the 3 nearest targets.

Level 15: Every 2 casts, fire a second blast at the next closest enemy, dealing 75% damage.

Level 30: Ignore 60% of the target's Armor. Reduce max mana by 10.

skill.name: Glittering Plumage Regalia
skill.desc:
Gain 10% max Health, then deal magic damage every second to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Subsequent casts heal 10% and increase the damage.

skill.name: Bright Star Blast
skill.desc: Deal magic damage to the target and reduces their Magic Resist by 10.

skill.name: 52 Card Calamity
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks bounce between 3 enemies, dealing 25/40/200 (AP) bonus magic damage and marking enemies hit. Attacks deal 30% reduced damage per hit.

Active: Deal 80/120/1500 (AD) physical damage to the 4/4/20 closest enemies, and detonate their marks for 20/30/500 (AP) magic damage each.

skill.name: Blazing Phoenix Stance
skill.desc: Make 3 rapid attacks. Each heals Udyr for health and deals additional damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius.

skill.name: Level Zero: 100 Shot Demon
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain mana when units die. Enemies grant 5, allies 3.

Active: Fire piercing arrows per second at random enemies until Varus is out of mana. Each arrow costs 12 mana and deals physical damage, reduced by 35% per hit.
stats: Base Arrows Per Second: 3 + 1 per 50% Attack Speed

skill.name: Shining Knuckle Explosion
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 2 Armor & MR for each component equipped to your team.

Active: Heal health, deal physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target, and 20% Sunder enemies hit for 4 seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

skill.name: Combo of the Ruined King
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal magic damage.

Active: The next three attacks unleash a devastating combo.

Pommel Bash: Deal magic damage.
Rising Slash: Deal magic damage and briefly Stun the target.
Falling Slash: Deal magic damage.

skill.name: Ursine Instinct
skill.desc:
Passive: Every 4th attack deals 90/135/500 (AD) physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. When changing targets, immediately slam for 70% damage.

Active: For 5 seconds gain 99/99/300, Attack Speed, 10%/10%/25% (AP) Omnivamp, and crowd control immunity.

skill.name: PBEWraithDamageTracker
skill.desc: TBA

skill.name: Sharp Feathers Shine
skill.desc: Gain 80% attack speed for 3 attacks. These attacks deal bonus physical damage to the target and 2 nearby enemies.

skill.name: Guarding Crescent
skill.desc: Heal health, deal physical damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius, and mark the current target. For 3 seconds, take 40% reduced damage from unmarked enemies.

skill.name: Unsheath the Storm
skill.desc: Deal physical damage to the 3 closest enemies.

skill.name: Dual Blade Technique: Inner Reflection
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks grant 4% stacking Attack Speed and Movement Speed, and alternate between dealing bonus true damage and bonus magic damage.

Active: Send an echo towards the two furthest enemies, dealing physical damage and briefly Stunning enemies hit.

skill.name: Read Or Die
skill.desc:
Launch 15 pages dealing magic damage each, split between the target and enemies within 2 hexes. Each subsequent cast launches 5 more pages.

Potential: Every 2 pages, launch a bonus page that deals true damage.

Potential : Every 5 pages, launch a bonus page that deals true damage.
stats: Potential Page Damage: 32% of 28 / 42 / 150 per Potential

skill.name: Reality Ripple
skill.desc: Heal and deal magic damage to enemies within a 1-hex radius.

skill.name: Orbital Ordinance
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks are bouncing bombs that deal magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Active: Deal magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

skill.name: Crystal Thorn Expansion
skill.desc:
Summon 4 untargetable Thornspitters that deal per attack and attack 4 times.

Non-plant allies gain Attack Speed decaying over 4 seconds.

skill.name: Crystal Barbs
skill.desc: Attacks deal bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Crystal Barbs
skill.desc: Attacks deal bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Training Dummy
skill.desc: aUse on a champion to spawn a movable target dummy nearby. Cannot be used in combat.
